monster.name: Barovian Witch

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The witch is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
•1st level (4 slots): ray of sickness, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter

action.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

monster.spells: mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, ray of sickness, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter, alter self, invisibility

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ruffian makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.
